column4: hey guys... plaease help i deleted somthing on my machine and now it wont boot up. last thing i did was removed some things i thought were the video driver, but apparantly it was important. how can i fix it.
what does it tell you when it can't boot up?
nothing it just sits there with a black screen only says something when i restart it. (normal shutdown text)
have you tried alt+f1 to drop to TTY?
ok that went to the tty. but now what?
it says welcome to ubuntu 11.04. then the warnings
the warranty stuff. this comes withi no WARANTY or whatever
did it not give you any error at all when trying to use startx?
no but let me double check
it says usr/bin/x: not found then it gives up
ok. that's a starting point.. I don't really know how to help - but that will improve your odds for getting help in here if you include that error in your question
i'm not sure if that's your problem
thank you so much. i fixed it. that link help solve part of it. then i did sudo apt-get install nvidia-current and bingo it worked thank you so much. (very valuable time saved)
you're quite welcome :) i'm glad i could help ^-^
